column8: 立下自己的墓碑，以此证明我们为<Yellow:对抗融蚀>献出生命的决意——这不仅是弥萨格的传统，也是我们结束预科学习、成为正式调查员的标志。
column9: Erect your tombstone, and devote your life to the fight against <Yellow:Dissolution>. This Mythag tradition marks your graduation from preparatory studies, and the beginning of your tenure as an Investigator.

column8: 或者说……欢迎你，正式跨入世界的里侧。
column9: Or rather, welcome back to the world beyond the veil.

column8: 希望你的@1 外勤课题不像微积分课程一样依赖我这个<Blue:助手>。
column9: Just promise me your @1 field work won't rely too much on me as your <Blue:assistant>; or at least, not as much as you did for your Calculus course.

column8: 细雨将指尖濡湿，微弱的电流穿透手套，顺着你的皮肤和她的指尖隐秘流淌。
column9: Raindrops slip into your gloves, wetting your fingertips. A faint current seeps through the material, flowing secretly between your skin and hers.

column8:
你可不能轻易倒下哦，<Yellow:世界唯一>的守密人。
我们还指望靠你来调查和记录所有被融蚀抹消的历史呢。
column9: As <Yellow:the one and only> Keeper in this world, you mustn't falter. We're counting on you to investigate and document all history lost to Dissolution.

column8: 淅沥的雨声填满天地。
column9: The sound of pattering rain fills the world.

column8: <Red:不安、疼痛、窒息>却在某滴雨珠落下时，填满了胸口。
column9: Yet with the fall of a single raindrop, <Red:unease, pain, and suffocation> suddenly flood your chest.

column8:
保护好你手中的指令仪，小心融蚀污染。
在接下来的战斗中，它不可或缺。
column9: Protect the command device in your hand and beware of Dissolution! It will be essential in the upcoming battle!

column8: 视线尽头，金发少年抬着与身量不相称的黑色巨盾，正在抵抗身姿矫健的双剑战士的攻击。
column9: In the periphery of your vision, a blond youth raises a massive black shield, barely fending off the assault of a dual-wielding swordswoman.

column8: 他用护盾牢牢挡住身后的粉色长发少女，被逼得节节后退。
column9: He guards a pink-haired girl behind him, each deflected attack pushing him back another step.

column8: 你认识她，她是以难交流著称的教授朵尔，隶属于<Blue:唤醒系科研所>。换句话说，是非战斗人员。
column9: You recognize her—Professor Doll, belonging to the <Blue:Awakening Research Institute> and infamously difficult to communicate with. In other words, a non-combatant.

column8:
拉蒙娜。
那些是我们的义务，%player%只是个刚读完预科的新人。
column9: Ramona. This is our duty. %player% is still a freshman, freshly graduated from prep school.

column8:
情况紧急，我们别无选择，不是吗？
而且，%player%不是普通的新生，%heorshe%是我们唯一的守密人。
column9: It's an emergency! We have no choice, right? Besides, %player% isn't just any freshman. {Male=He's,Female=She's} our only Keeper.

column8: 我们面对的是会毁灭物质存在本身的现象，一旦被<Yellow:融蚀>污染，你的一切都会烟消云散。
column9: We're combating a phenomenon that unmakes existence itself. Once contaminated by <Yellow:Dissolution>, everything that is <Bold:you> will vanish entirely from this world.

column8: 你在宣誓仪式中刻在墓碑上的名字，也会化作一滩黑泥，无人铭记。
column9: Your tombstone inscription and your legacy will be reduced to a sludge of nothingness, forgotten by all.

column8:
你来得很及时，守密人。
我和奥吉尔……都已经是强弩之末了。
column9: Your timing is adequate, Keeper. Ogier and I... we were at our limit.

column8: 只听“咣”地一声，萝坦的双剑再次击碎了黑色粘液凝固成的巨盾。
column9: With a clang, Lotan's twin swords shatter his shield of black sludge once again.

column8: 名为萝坦的唤醒体挥舞着双刀，一次又一次地袭向奥吉尔，那威力昭示着无情的现实——她已经彻底失控了。
column9: Awakener Lotan swings her twin blades, relentlessly assaulting Ogier. The sheer power behind each strike makes it clear—she has lost control.

column8: 夸我的时候“百年一遇”，真面临危机了就把我当花瓶，这不太合适。
column9: When praising me, you refer to me as a "once-in-a-century prodigy", but in times of crisis, I'm relegated to but a figurehead. That's hardly appropriate.

column8:
况且，就凭你我二人，根本不可能突破钟楼那边的包围。
我们需要帮助，需要支配唤醒体的力量。
column9: Besides, we can't possibly break through the blockade around the Clock Tower by ourselves. We'll need all the help we can get... we must find a way to command the Awakeners.

column8: <Shake:早知如此……绝不与你们定下约定……>
column9: <Shake:Had I known this would happen... I would have never made that pact...>

column8: 你们穿过钟楼下的小门，进入一处隐蔽的封闭通道。
column9: You slip through a hidden door beneath the Clock Tower, stepping into a concealed passage.

column8:
尽人皆知的，我猜就不叫密道了。
通道连接的是<Yellow:黑池>，那是弥萨格的立身之本。
column9: If it was common knowledge, it would hardly qualify as a secret passage. This tunnel leads to the <Yellow:Black Pool>... the foundation of Mythag.

column8: 如果没有黑池底的被称为<Yellow:核>的<Yellow:巨型银芯>，仅靠孱弱的人类精神来维持唤醒体现世，弥萨格的唤醒体技术不知道要比现在落后几十年。
column9: Without the giant Silver artifact known as the <Yellow:Core> at the bottom of the Black Pool, our Awakener technology would regress decades. Human spirits alone are too fragile to sustain them.

column8:
说着，朵尔按下了通道侧面一个不显眼的按钮。
叮的一声，门洞敞开，你们迈入光线幽暗的狭小空间。
column9: As she speaks, Doll presses an inconspicuous button on the wall. A sharp ding rings out as the doorway slides open, revealing a cramped and dimly lit chamber beyond.

column8: 恍惚间，你眼前非人的身影，与你在钥冢中出神时看到的年轻女性的轮廓悄然重合。
column9: Mesmerized, you gaze upon the inhuman entity; Their outline briefly superimposing with that of the young woman you saw while in a trance back at the Keygrave.

column8: 至高、至洁、至善、至美。
column9: The Supreme. The Purest. The Noblest. The Fairest.

column8: 白色的怪物发出喑哑的声音，似是嘶吼，又似是悲鸣。
column9: The pale monster emits a hoarse cry; roar and wail entwined.

column8: 那绝非人类的语言，你却理解了祂话语中的含义。
column9: It was most definitely not human speech, yet you comprehend Their meaning perfectly.

column8: 眼前的一切突然变得模糊，你眨了眨眼睛，温热的液体从你脸颊滑过。
column9: Your vision blurs and unexpectedly, your eyes sting. Warm rivulets trace paths down your cheeks.

column8: 那是泪水吗？可是为什么？是什么让你感到胸口发紧，眼眶酸涩？
column9: Are these tears? But why? What is this ache constricting your chest?

column8: 洪积90年，<Blue:华德·菲利普斯>，<Blue:刻拉尔克什>和<Blue:塔薇>成立了<Blue:弥萨格学院（Mythag College）>。
column9: In the year AF 90, <Blue:Ward Philips>, <Blue:Khlarcus>, and <Blue:Tawil> founded <Blue:Mythag College>.

column8: 那正是你现在所在的，<Blue:弥萨格大学（Mythag University）>的前身。
column9: That was where you stood now. The predecessor to the current day <Blue:Mythag University>.

column8: 你爆发出能够达到的最快速度，勉强挡在了拉蒙娜的面前。
column9: You unleashed every ounce of speed you possessed, barely managing to intercept Their path.

column8: 银钥匙闪过回应的微光。
column9: The Key faintly shines in response.

column8: 全都化成了一滩黑水，随后消失不见。
column9: One by one, they melt into the Black Pool before vanishing completely. The woman with a vacant expression begins to float upward.

column8: 不顾拉蒙娜和朵尔的呼喊，你握着银钥匙眺望高处，眺望向「塔薇」退回的「门」之内。
column9: Deaf to Ramona and Doll's calls, you clutch the Silver Key and stare up at "Tawil," already being engulfed by the "Gate" above.

column8:
你清晰地记得刚才看到的面容。
无论是淡漠的神色，眉眼的轮廓，还是嘴唇的弧度，都与拉蒙娜——
column9: You know that face. The indifference. The brows. The lips. They all mirror Ramona's appearance.

column8: ……弥萨格大学是对抗融蚀的先行者，是守望人类未来的重要防线。
column9: ...We of Mythag University are pioneers in the battle against Dissolution. We stand as humanity's last line of defense.

column8: 说话的人是弥萨格生命科学院代理院长诃勒特，传说中她能够看见异种生物，是前任院长最钟爱的学生。
column9: Ms. Czort is the Acting Dean of Mythag's Department of Biological Studies. Legend had it that she could see otherworldly beings. The former dean's star pupil.

column8: 虽然你希望知道真相，但还是点头答应。
column9: Although you wish to know the truth, you nod in agreement compliantly.
